scripts.build:all: npx nx run apigateway:build && npx nx run auth-service:build && npx nx run file-management-service:build && npx nx run users-service:build
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npx nx run apigateway:start" "npx nx run auth-service:start" "npx nx run file-management-service:start" "npx nx run users-service:start"
